course.name: Продуктивност 2026: Как да управляваме екипи и време
course.description: 30-дневен практически курс за основи на продуктивността, GTD, приоритизиране, Kanban, гъвкави методи и стратегическо планиране. Дневни уроци от 20-30 минути с конкретни инструменти и шаблони.

lessons.title: Дефиниция на продуктивността: изход, резултати и ограничения
Време, енергия, внимание: какво управлявате на практика
Йерархия на целите: визия → резултати → проекти → следващи стъпки
Навици срещу системи: защо системите се мащабират по-добре
Измерване: прости метрики за седмичен преглед (важни резултати, блокове за фокус, прехвърлени задачи)
Улавяне: входящи кутии, списък с тригери, навици за улавяне
Дневна/седмична система: сутрешен ритуал, дневен huddle, седмичен преглед
Цена на сменяне на контекст: Остатък от внимание, Пакетна обработка, Блокове за дълбока работа
Делегиране срещу Премахване: Кога да делегирате, Какво да премахнете

course.name: Productivity 2026: How to Manage Teams and Time
course.description: 30-day practical course on productivity foundations, GTD, prioritization, Kanban, agile methods, and strategic planning. Daily 20-30 minute lessons with concrete tools and templates.

lessons.title: Productivity definition: output, outcomes, and constraints
Time, energy, attention: what you manage in practice
Goal hierarchy: vision → outcomes → projects → next actions
Habits vs systems: why systems scale better
Measurement: simple weekly review metrics (throughput, focus blocks, carryover)
Capture: inboxes, triggers list, capture habits
Daily/Weekly System: morning ritual, daily huddle, weekly review
Context Switching Cost: Attention Residue, Batching, Deep Work Blocks
Delegation vs Elimination: When to Delegate, What to Eliminate
Energy Management: When to Work, When to Rest, Recovery Rituals
Goal setting & OKRs (SMART goals, OKR framework)
Accountability Structures: Systems That Keep You on Track
Decision-Making Frameworks: Rapid Decisions, Decision Matrix, Avoiding Analysis Paralysis
Meeting efficiency (agenda, time limits, decision log)
Teamwork and synergy (roles, responsibility, coordination)
Stress management and fatigue (recovery, work-life balance)
Sustaining motivation (tracking progress, celebrating wins)
Crisis management and adaptability (adaptation, quick learning)
Long-term planning (years ahead, strategy, evolution)
Personal life productivity (home organization, personal projects)
Community and network (relationships, learning with others)
Technology and tools (automation, choosing the right technology)
Creativity and innovation (rethinking, experimentation)
Filtering and priorities (what to ignore, what matters)
Skill development (higher levels, new competencies)
Mentoring and teaching (sharing knowledge, helping others)
Habits and rituals (daily routines, long-term action)
Values and goals (life purpose, long-term vision)
Continuous improvement (learning, feedback, iteration)
The productivity master (comprehensive integration, commitment)
